title: Lies We Tell Ourselves
description: Lies. They twist and taunt and tear apart every aspect of your life.Are you ready?Paige Fischer is not. She hates lies and how destructive they can be and yet, she's living the biggest lie of them all. In fact, she's barely hanging on...One missing sister...Twelve years ago, her identical twin, Jessica was kidnapped and Paige is to blame.One devoted fiancé...She has the perfect partner who is beyond patient but how long will he wait and how will he react when she tells him she can't move forward in their life together?One fateful lie...Someone close to Paige is playing a dangerous game and all it takes is one lie, one phone call, one twisted truth and her life is in danger.Lies and secrets collide in this page-turning suspense you won’t be able to put down, written by the NYT bestselling author who brought you Finding Emma and The Perfect Secret.
author: Steena Holmes
